title: I NEED HELP ITS ABOUT FPS QUICKLY RESPOND PLEASE THX!!!
body:
Hello everyone supporters/players well i think im having bad problem.Anyways guys i got my new graphic card yesterday Nvidia Ge Force 9800GTX and my frame is so bad i cannot handle it but i think i found something about settings and that stuffs so could u help me bout it?Alright so i played practice tool to try it and i take low settings okay but somehow i think my graphic card Nvidia give ultra graphic i mean it looks like its very high graphic and i got on it 15-20fps i cannot fix it i wanna make it lower so my fps could be alright but i cannot do anything could u guys help me?
My specs 
Nvidia GTX 9800 GE FORCE GraphicCard
Intel Pentium Dual Cpu 1.80ghz
2ram
64bit operating system
windows 10 pro
COULD U GUYS HELP ME FASTEST YOU CAN I THINK ITS ABOUT SETTINGS BUT I DONT KNOW HOW TO SET IT IM 13 YRS OLD MY DAD FREAKED OUT WHEN HE UNDERSTOOD IT DOESNT WORK BUT HE PAY A LOT COULD U HELP ME THX?
(EDIT)I will buy more ram i know tht    {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}  {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Really quick just to clear up, higher FPS numbers are better!!

Let's first make sure that new card has all of the driver updates it needs. Be sure to double check that you aren't missing any Nvidia drivers by checking their website, but I would also take a little time to go through the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well. Those steps can help a number of different issues and might be able to help get League running smoother for you.

It's still good to check if you haven't yet, as well as checking the other steps in that [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) I linked. There are a lot of other useful steps in there that can help with a variety of issues. I'd also try checking to see if any background programs might be taking up processing power or something that might be lowering the quality. If you need a little more immediate help, you might be able to hit up the techs in a live chat on the [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) page.
I did fps guide if u dont know could u call someone else who could help me i really need that help!

No worries, be sure to hit up those techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more in-depth help. Be sure to attach some game logs as well, which you can make using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool). Those logs will give the techs a little more info to work with too!
There is worry!! Techs need long to response pls help me ure my last chance
Comeone how to fix it i cannot handle it anymore!!!
I  go kill myself then i cannot play LOL 3 months bcs of graphic or whatever i think i will quit no one wants to help me really..
Im feeling so bad that graphic on Gta sa on that ultra graphic i got 25fps like what the duck.
Omg i tried it on every time i see very huge graphic settings i even see it on Grand Theft Auto : Sa HELP ME FAST
